attributes.name: Ouroboros Charm
attributes.description: An ancient symbol [Mission Item]
attributes.parsed_description: An ancient symbol [Mission Item]

attributes.name: Outpost Rush Cache
attributes.description: Open this container to get items usable at or around the indicated level. Containers are not affected by Luck.
attributes.parsed_description: Open this container to get items usable at or around the indicated level. Containers are not affected by Luck.

attributes.name: Oyster
attributes.description: An oyster. This can be salvaged into bait and its pearl collected.
attributes.parsed_description: An oyster. This can be salvaged into bait and its pearl collected.

attributes.name: Oyster Bait
attributes.description: Fishing Bait. Gives a large boost to chance of catching bigger fish in fresh water.
attributes.parsed_description: Fishing Bait. Gives a large boost to chance of catching bigger fish in fresh water.

attributes.name: Paddlefish Gills
attributes.description: The gills of a paddlefish.
attributes.parsed_description: The gills of a paddlefish.

attributes.name: Pallid Ash Wood
attributes.description: Wood from Periville in Weaver's Fen. It's quite strong despite its paleness.
attributes.parsed_description: Wood from Periville in Weaver's Fen. It's quite strong despite its paleness.

attributes.name: Papers from Sordamor's Honor
attributes.description: Documents found inside a secret compartment in the figurehead of Sordamor's Honor.
attributes.parsed_description: Documents found inside a secret compartment in the figurehead of Sordamor's Honor.

attributes.name: Paprika
attributes.description: Paprika powder, used to add a savory, spiced element to cuisine.
attributes.parsed_description: Paprika powder, used to add a savory, spiced element to cuisine.

attributes.name: Parsley
attributes.description: Parsley leaves, used to add a touch of bitterness to cuisine.
attributes.parsed_description: Parsley leaves, used to add a touch of bitterness to cuisine.

attributes.name: Party Keg of Brew
attributes.description: A keg of brew.
attributes.parsed_description: A keg of brew.

attributes.name: Patch of Corrupted Cloth
attributes.description: Crafting item with an attunement to the Ice damage perk.
attributes.parsed_description: Crafting item with an attunement to the Ice damage perk.

attributes.name: Peacock Sample
attributes.description: The crimson viscera of the local bird population.
attributes.parsed_description: The crimson viscera of the local bird population.

attributes.name: Pearl
attributes.description: Used in Jewelcrafting.
attributes.parsed_description: Used in Jewelcrafting.

attributes.name: Peppercorn
attributes.description: Whole peppercorns, used to add a savory, warm element to cuisine.
attributes.parsed_description: Whole peppercorns, used to add a savory, warm element to cuisine.

attributes.name: Perennial Herb Provisions
attributes.description: Herbal provisions for the town's stockpile
attributes.parsed_description: Herbal provisions for the town's stockpile

attributes.name: Perennial Herb Stockpile
attributes.description: A vast quantity of perennial herbs for the town's stockpile
attributes.parsed_description: A vast quantity of perennial herbs for the town's stockpile

attributes.name: Perfect Corrupted Sigil
attributes.description: Crafting item with an attunement to the Thrust Protection perk.
attributes.parsed_description: Crafting item with an attunement to the Thrust Protection perk.

attributes.name: Perfected Hemp String
attributes.description: Hemp string spun by Dryad Bowyers for bowcrafting. It's quality is unmatched, and provides a smooth draw.
attributes.parsed_description: Hemp string spun by Dryad Bowyers for bowcrafting. It's quality is unmatched, and provides a smooth draw.

attributes.name: Perfected Wyrdwood Tears
attributes.description: High quality Wyrdwood Tears gathered by Dryad soldiers. Its energy is a catalyst for life magic.
attributes.parsed_description: High quality Wyrdwood Tears gathered by Dryad soldiers. Its energy is a catalyst for life magic.

attributes.name: Perpetual Illumination Essence
attributes.description: Essence found on the bones of the Ancient Guardians that contributes to their eerie glow.
attributes.parsed_description: Essence found on the bones of the Ancient Guardians that contributes to their eerie glow.

attributes.name: Perseus Sky Disk
attributes.description: A flat clay disk with a rendering of the night sky.
attributes.parsed_description: A flat clay disk with a rendering of the night sky.

attributes.name: Petalcap
attributes.description: The flesh of a Petalcap mushroom.
attributes.parsed_description: The flesh of a Petalcap mushroom.

attributes.name: Petrified Fire
attributes.description: At first, this appears to be a gemstone, but it is hot to the touch, with the very essence of fire coursing through it. Is it the core of an Ancient fire staff?
attributes.parsed_description: At first, this appears to be a gemstone, but it is hot to the touch, with the very essence of fire coursing through it. Is it the core of an Ancient fire staff?

attributes.name: Petrified Wood
attributes.description: Wood so old it has taken on the properties of stone.
attributes.parsed_description: Wood so old it has taken on the properties of stone.

attributes.name: Phasefiber
attributes.description: Thin threads of fiber spun together. When used to bind clothing, the needle guiding the fiber does not leave a hole behind it.
attributes.parsed_description: Thin threads of fiber spun together. When used to bind clothing, the needle guiding the fiber does not leave a hole behind it.

attributes.name: Phial of Perfume
attributes.description: A small phial of quality perfume, imported from the Old World.
attributes.parsed_description: A small phial of quality perfume, imported from the Old World.

attributes.name: Philosopher's Stone
attributes.description: Prima Materia. Flamel's Legacy. The stuff many Arcanists only dream of posseessing. Improve your Arcana trophy with this.
attributes.parsed_description: Prima Materia. Flamel's Legacy. The stuff many Arcanists only dream of posseessing. Improve your Arcana trophy with this.

attributes.description: A stone of mystical properties that can help in transmutation.
